subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. may be ready to take its sport outdoors, with Yankee Stadium among several stadiums being considered to play host to a hockey game during the 2006-7 season.
snippet: The N.H.L. may be ready to take its sport outdoors, with Yankee Stadium among several stadiums being considered to play host to a hockey game during the 2006-7 season.
